bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Insulation-Piercing Connectors
IEEE Standard for Insulation-Piercing Connectors

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The technical requirements, tests, inspection rules, sign, and package of insulation-piercing connector used in aerial insulated cable lines, bridges and culverts, galleries, tunnels, mines, cable wells, etc., for rated voltages up to 12kV are defined and described in this standard.

The technical requirements, tests, inspection rules, sign, and package of insulation-piercing connector used in aerial insulated cable lines, bridges and culverts, galleries, tunnels, mines, cable wells, etc., for rated voltages up to 12kV are defined and described in this standard.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
